precision = 5
10000000000 + 3 != 10000000003
10000000000000000000000 + 3 != 10000000000000000000003
1000000000000000000000000000000000000 + 3 != 1000000000000000000000000000000000003

precision = 20
10000000000 + 3 = 10000000003
10000000000000000000000 + 3 != 10000000000000000000003
1000000000000000000000000000000000000 + 3 != 1000000000000000000000000000000000003

precision = 50
10000000000 + 3 = 10000000003
10000000000000000000000 + 3 = 10000000000000000000003
1000000000000000000000000000000000000 + 3 = 1000000000000000000000000000000000003
